title: Problems with connection.
body: Tracert says I'm going from PA to Maryland to Comcasts main center and then I'm traveling to Amazon Network Technologies in Seattle and timing out there.  Anyone else having these issues?

replies.body: Actually filed a report with the FCC on Comcast and they not only got in touch with me they went out with a maintenance team and found the line causing interference and fixed it.  Not a single disconnect in weeks. And 6 months of free Service.  Wasn't on leagues end at all.

Can you run a full traceroute using [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/) and the host IP of **104.160.131.1** so I can take a look? I'd like you to let that traceroute run for ~5 minutes, then export the results as text before pasting them in a reply to me.

Thanks!
